category.name: Core Machine Learning and Deep Learning

items.category: Core Machine Learning and Deep Learning
items.name: accelerate
items.description: Accelerate is a library that enables the same PyTorch code to be run across distributed configurations

items.category: Core Machine Learning and Deep Learning
items.name: ColossalAI
items.description: Tools to kickstart distributed training and inference

items.category: Core Machine Learning and Deep Learning
items.name: composer
items.description: A open-source deep learning training library optimized for scalability and usability, integrating best practices for efficient, multi-node training

items.category: Core Machine Learning and Deep Learning
items.name: DeepSpeed
items.description: DeepSpeed is a deep learning optimization library that makes distributed training and inference easy, efficient, and effective.

items.category: Core Machine Learning and Deep Learning
items.name: fastai
items.description: fastai is a deep learning library which provides practitioners with high-level components that can quickly and easily provide state-of-the-art results in standard deep learning domains, and provides researchers with low-level components that can be mixed and matched to build new approaches

items.category: Core Machine Learning and Deep Learning
items.name: Horovod
items.description: Horovod is a distributed deep learning training framework for TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, and Apache MXNet

items.category: Core Machine Learning and Deep Learning
items.name: Ignite
items.description: High-level library to help with training and evaluating neural networks in PyTorch

items.category: Core Machine Learning and Deep Learning
items.name: PyTorch Lightning
items.description: Pretrain, finetune and deploy AI models on multiple GPUs, TPUs with zero code changes.

items.category: Core Machine Learning and Deep Learning
items.name: Torch-TensorRT
items.description: Torch-TensorRT is a inference compiler for PyTorch, targeting NVIDIA GPUs via NVIDIAâ€™s TensorRT Deep Learning Optimizer and Runtime.
